tag_list: fashion, technology, mobile, china, facebook, social-commerce, speaker
overview:
Anina is a model with a passion for technology, the first “model blogger”, the founder of the 360Fashion Network, creator of Anina Dress Up, and a four year Nokia Champion. She is currently China’s top foreign model, the first in the history of China ever to receive an award at the China Fashion Awards. She has appeared in ELLE, MARIE CLAIRE, L’OFFICIEL, and walked the catwalks of designers such as Sonia Rykiel, Dres van Noten, and a host of Chinese top designers.

Anina brought mobile blogging to the fashion industry in 2005 together with Nokia Corporation and Sixapart with the first fashion blogger conference. She has spoken at the top technology conferences in the world such as LE WEB, PICNIC, LIFT, DLD, MOBILE WORLD CONGRESS, along with fashion conferences and social media conferences.

Anina has developed 360Fashion to have mobile news applications on every mobile phone platform from iPhone, Nokia, Android, Bada, and is now launching an application in China. 360Fashion also has facebook live streaming apps and 360Social Commerce platform with fcommerce, mcommerce, and ecommerce that connects to Chinese social media.

Anina wishes to user her image and name to encourage other women to participate in creating technology so that there may be more services to cater to a woman’s multitasking lifestyle.
